name: AB Tasty
slogan: A/B testing, personalisation and user engagement
description:
AB Tasty is one of the most innovative and fast-growing companies in the web industry (Pass French Tech). Unlike first-generation CRO software, AB Tasty offers proprietary algorithms that allow for automated and continuous revenue maximization. Quick and efficient conversions, at an affordable price - the average return on investment of our customers is 10x.

Increase your conversion rates in a few minutes with AB Tasty, the all-in-one and expandable conversion optimization platform for a fast return on investment. Run A/B/n, split, multivariate & multi-page tests, personalize your marketing messages and engage with your website visitors at the right time.

With the sharp rise of m-commerce, AB Tasty’s tool was designed to handle cross-device tests (available on websites, mobiles, and applications).

jobs.title: Account Executive - DACH
jobs.description:
This is a high-energy, new business sales role with a focus on developing new profitable customers across the DACH region. You will contribute to AB Tasty hyper-growth by acquiring new clients.

We are looking for driven professionals who are willing to strongly contribute to AB Tasty hyper-growth with ample experience and an established network and portfolio of clients within the digital marketing community across the region


What you will do 
- We are looking for high-energy, driven professionals with natural sales instincts to join our business development team in Germany. 
- AB Tasty offers a fast-paced, innovative environment where you will be able to contribute to the company success, accelerate your career, bring and grow your skills and explore new opportunities in the digital market.
- Ideal candidates should be eager to advance through a learning and earning path, as well as to help scale a successful French startup in the German market.
- Working & Sharing with the local team, reporting to HQ the Business Developer’s tasks will be:
- Prospecting and making appointments with new potential clients according to targets set by the VP Sales
- Identification & Qualification of new commercial opportunities including large and high potential mid-market accounts across the DACH region
- Response to Tenders, RFIs, RFQs, etc.
- Lobby with high-level decision makers
- Negotiation and closing of deals while maintaining command of the sales cycle
- Managing short & intense sales cycles in parallel of long-term high potential deals
- Support our growing reputation by representing & spreading AB Tasty core values
- Reporting of activity to VP Sales
  


What you are looking for 
- Fluent German + Working English
- At least one successful experience in selling a SaaS MarTech solution
- At least 5 years of experience in a sales function of software or consulting and proven network in the DACH market
- Knowledge of digital marketing
- Hunter mentality. You must hold dearly, deep within your soul, the tasks of prospecting, negotiation and closing of deals
- Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to multi-task, prioritize and manage time effectively
- Excellent negotiation techniques and you are used to dealing with decision makers, mostly Chief Digital Officers and Heads of Marketing Departments.
- A team player, with excellent interpersonal skills, enthusiastic and positive personality, with a can-do attitude.

jobs.title: Big Data Engineer
jobs.description:
The data team, composed of 7 members who work closely with both the DevOps and the DataScience teams, is in charge of developing and monitoring the data collect pipeline. The collect, which processes a few terabytes of data per day, has been deployed on a Google Cloud Platform environment and is critical to AB Tasty. Different GCP environments are available to ensure the good development and deployement of features as well as data modelisation and documentation. 


What you will do : 
- Create or update features of the processing data collect using GCP components as dataflow, bigquery, bigtable
- Develop a new environment with services, dashboard to ensure the data quality in real-time and design a moniting process
- Participate in the design phases and implementation of new micro-services and machine-learning features plugged into the pipeline
- Explore and implement new data sources
- Monitor the pipeline


What we're looking for :
- Strong knowledge of at least one of the following technologies: Apache Beam / Spark / Hadoop
- Knowledge in Java, Python, and/or Golang
- A least 2 years of experiences as a (Big) Data Engineer
- Experience with cloud platform is a plus
- Good level of English (written and spoken)

jobs.title: Business Development Representative - DACH
jobs.description:
This is a high-energy, new sales development role with a focus on finding new potential customers across the DACH region. You will contribute to AB Tasty hyper-growth by helping to acquire new clients.
We are looking for driven professionals who are willing to strongly contribute to AB Tasty hyper-growth and ready to work in a fast build & learn environment. 
You will gain experience interacting with prospective clients of all levels and in a variety of industries. 

AB Tasty offers a fast-paced, innovative environment where you will be able to accelerate your career, grow your skills and explore new opportunities in the digital market.


What you will do
- Ideal candidates should be eager to advance through a learning and earning path, as well as to help scale a successful French startup in the Geman market.
- Working & Sharing with the local team, tasks will be:
- Partner with Business Developers to help fill their sales pipeline and develop your skills
- Research and build new and existing accounts (e.g. adding contacts, sending customized e-mails, strategic calling)
- Create and prioritize strategic target account lists
- Qualify and follow-up new accounts by using our lead scoring system
- Generate new business opportunities to fuel our growth
- Create a great first impression to our prospects by providing them with a world class experience and thinking of innovative ways to approach them
- Achieve monthly quotas of qualified new business opportunities


What we are looking for
- A first sales development experience
- Native level written/verbal German skills
- Ability to take initiative
- Strong self-starter personality, not afraid of being tenacious and resilient
- Strong interest in new technologies and desire to be in technology sales
- Experience with digital marketing and/or web analytics tools is a plus
- Ability to multi-task, prioritize and manage time effectively
- Desire to learn and work in a fast-paced and dynamic startup environment
- Strong problem-solving skills
- Good written/verbal English skills

jobs.title: Cybersecurity Engineer
jobs.description:
What you will do :
- Work alongside the Feature Teams in order to propagate the best practices of secure development, deployment and to accompany the developers in considering the requirements of security.
- Design and lead training and awareness sessions on secure development.
- Provide security expertise to teams developing security-related features (authentication, access control, etc).
- Conduct technical audits (intrusion test, code audit) of applications published by AB Tasty, determine the actions to be undertaken and monitor their proper implementation with the teams.
- Set up and operate tools and processes to enhance application security (Web Application Firewall, static and dynamic code analysis, Bug Bounty, etc).
- Collaborate with the Security Compliance Manager on the Information Security Management System on topics related to application security.


What we are looking for :
- Mastery of OWASP, as well as application and defense against attack techniques are essential.
- Knowledge of ISO 27001 and / or legal and regulatory requirements for tracers would be a plus.
- You are an educator, you like to work in a team and are not opposed to writing pragmatic documents (policies, procedures, etc).

jobs.title: Enterprise Key Account Manager - UK and Nordics
jobs.description:
Are you a high-energy, driven professional who is passionate about e-commerce, digital marketing and new technologies?

We are looking for a skilled Enterprise Key Account Manager (KAM) to oversee our relationship with our largest UK clients. As a KAM, you will be responsible for obtaining and maintaining long term key customers by understanding their requirements of the AB Tasty platform and uncovering their needs for the future in the ever-changing world of CRO. 

The ideal candidate will be capable of building strong relationships with strategic customers. You will be able to identify the demands and requirements to promote our company’s solutions and achieve a mutually beneficial cooperation. As Key Account Manager, you will be responsible for contract renewals, upselling and cross selling of your customer portfolio.


What you will do
- Develop relationships with a portfolio of large strategic clients to ensure their continuous engagement with the AB Tasty platform
- Acquire a thorough understanding of key customer needs and requirements 
- Propose solutions that meet the client’s objectives and changing demands
- Ensure the correct products and services are delivered to customers in a timely manner
- Expand the relationships with existing customers engaging through all possible forms of contact, from meetings to weekly calls
- Serve as the link of communication between key customers and internal teams
- Resolve any issues and problems faced by customers and manage complaints in order to maintain trust
- Play an integral part in generating new sales that will turn into long-lasting relationships 
- Prepare regular reports of progress and forecasts to internal and external stakeholders using key account metrics


What we are looking for
- 3-5 years experience in a sales function of B2B platforms or consulting and proven network in the UK market
- Knowledge of digital marketing
- Proven experience implementing customer retention initiatives, achieving high retention rates and customer satisfaction
- Exceptional presentation skills
- Must have outstanding and effective communication skills (oral and written) in English
- You must have excellent negotiation techniques and you are used to dealing with decision makers, mostly Heads of Marketing and Product Departments
- The ability to draft clear and concise reports and presentations
- Experience working with [Salesforce.com](http://Salesforce.com)

jobs.title: Front-end Developer (Technical Support Engineer)
jobs.description:
The Front-end Developer (Technical Support Engineer) is part of the AB Tasty Clients Team and supports our key accounts through various channels (web & web mobile) in order to use our conversion optimisation solution with maximum efficiency. 
The Front-end Developer (Technical Support Engineer) will be responsible for the technical implementation of optimisation and personalisation campaigns that increase the conversion rate, improve the customer experience, and generate new leads for our clients.


What you will do
- Technical support in the implementation of AB tests and personalisation campaigns, including dynamic content (e.g. AngularJS, [react.js](http://react.js)), custom JS scripts and integrations.
- Processing and evaluation of client requests and, if necessary, coordination with the partner/product teams.
- Analysis, identification, and evaluation of new optimisation opportunities from technical, analytical, or qualitative sources.
- Support of the customer success team in technical pre-sales and in the onboarding of new clients.


What we are looking for
- Expert knowledge of JavaScript, HTML & CSS are a prerequisite.
- Training in the areas of web-design, IT, usability/UX, development.
- An analytical thinker who can apply his knowledge to diverse technical contexts in a creative and goal-oriented manner.
- Curiosity and willingness to constantly learn about new web- and online-marketing technologies.
- A team-player who is ready to share ideas and experiences and advance the team with constructive ideas.
- Fluency in English (spoken/written). French, Spanish or German are a plus.

jobs.title: Front-end Developer Junior (Client Team) - Alternance
jobs.description:
Au sein de l'équipe Client, les Front-End Développeur sont nommés "Technical Support Experts" et gèrent la mise en place de campagnes d'optimisation de sites web (HTML/CSS/JS) en collaboration avec les Customer Success Manager.

Passionné par le web, vous avez envie d'intégrer une équipe jeune et dynamique qui vous permettra de vous spécialiser dans les langages côté navigateur. Vous êtes autonomes et avez de bonnes connaissances en : Javascript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3.

En contact constant avec les CSM de l'équipe et indirect avec les clients, vous serez garant de la satisfaction client et de la qualité d'intégration des différentes campagnes. 
La bienveillance étant une des valeurs d'AB Tasty, vous devez avoir un excellent relationnel et aimer le travail en équipe.
Vous avez le goût des choses qui évoluent vite, des challenges, du travail collectif et l’envie de participer à un projet en plein essor. Vous aimez apprendre dans un univers où le marketing côtoie l'informatique et les statistiques. Il n'y a pas à hésiter, envoyez-nous votre candidature !


Missions
- Réalisez des études de faisabilité d’implémentation et proposez la meilleure solution d'intégration possible pour répondre au besoin du client
- Gérez la mise en place de tests A/B et de personnalisations pour les clients
- Accompagnez les CSM lors de formations Techniques
- Participez à la montée en compétence des CSM
- Participez au développement de l’outil en échangeant avec les différentes équipes (Produit/Recherche et développement).


Réquis
- Contrat d’alternance ou en stage
- Anglais : Courant
- Profil motivé, dynamique, positif, autonome
- Expérience réussie ou projet d’étude / freelance sur des missions similaires
- Excellent relationnel, personnalité enthousiaste et motivée
- Intérêt marqué pour l’univers du web et des nouvelles technologies

  • Gérez la mise en place de tests A/B et de personnalisations pour les clients
  • Accompagnez les CSM lors de formations Techniques
  • Participez à la montée en compétence des CSM
  • Participez au développement de l’outil en échangeant avec les différentes équipes (Produit/Recherche et développement).

Réquis

  • Contrat d’alternance ou en stage
  • Anglais : Courant
  • Profil motivé, dynamique, positif, autonome
  • Expérience réussie ou projet d’étude / freelance sur des missions similaires
  • Excellent relationnel, personnalité enthousiaste et motivée
  • Intérêt marqué pour l’univers du web et des nouvelles technologies

jobs.title: Frontend Developer ReactJS
jobs.description:
The AB Tasty’s future is being written in React! Within the technical team, working with the Team Leader, you will work in Scrum mode in a multi-skilled Feature Team (Product / Backend / Frontend) which has just one goal: to propose an ever more innovative, robust and end to end solution.
You will work with the Front-end of the application with other senior developers and a lead dev with whom you can exchange and build skills.


What you will do
- You write quality, effective, reusable and documented code
- You develop new features to meet the demands of the product team
- You maintain the current platform so that the customer experience is always improved

jobs.title: Fullstack Developer (Technical Support Engineer) - Flagship
jobs.description:
As a Technical Support Engineer, your mission will be to support our clients - Developers and Product Managers - to implement our brand new product FlagShip, using various platforms and languages (web & mobile). You will be responsible for the technical implementation, finding solutions to various clients’ problems, support of flag features, A/B Test, optimisation and personalisation campaigns in order increase our clients' conversion rate, improve the customer experience, and help generate new leads.

Along with your technical background you also need to have a good customer relationship skills and are able to identify users' needs to improve our support.


What you will do :
- SE (solutions engineer) activities (~70-80%) :
- Onboard our clients during the setup phase and be the technical support referer for them during all phases of implementation.- Write and enrich, day to day, technical documentation and FAQs.- Develop examples and use-cases for our clients.- Train the internal teams to the tool and keep following his continuous evolutions.- Feed the product team with relevant clients feedback to enhance our platform.- Help the CSM team with the technical roadmap of the clients.  
- TSE (technical support engineer) activities (~30-20%) :
- Technical expert in the implementation of optimisation and personalisation campaigns, especially regarding dynamic content- Technical feasibility studies to suggest the best integration solution to meet the customer's needs- Be part of technical training and workshops for clients and agencies

What we are looking for :
- Autonomous and rigorous, you know how to manage your time to accomplish your missions and in respect of the deadlines.
- Minimum of 2 years’ working experience in a related field.
- Knowledge of at least 3 languages, are a prerequisite (example : ES5, NodeJS, PHP, Python, Ruby, Angular, ReactJS,...).
- Fluency in English (spoken/written).
- Analytical thinking - be able to apply knowledge at diverse technical contexts in a creative and goal-oriented manner.
- Curiosity and willingness to constantly learn about web of tomorrow, product technologies, online-marketing.
- Team-player - ready to share ideas and knowledge with the rest of the team
- Very good knowledge of our products (Client-Side and FlagShip).
- You are curious, patient, pedagogue and friendly communicator.
- A successful project management experience is desired.
- iOS/Android development knowledge is a plus.

jobs.title: Human Resources Manager
jobs.description:
AB Tasty is looking for a Human Resources Manager to join and strengthen its People team.

As HR Manager you will be in charge of the HR Business Partners and Payroll and Staff Administration teams (4 people to manage) who work for all of AB TASTY Entities (except US area)



What you will do
- Coordination of human resources activities (except recruitment) with the support of your team, such as employment, compensation, employee relations, compensation & benefits, training, mobility, career management of our employees (whilst ensuring skills development, talent retention and performance management)
- Coordination of the payroll with the support of the payroll & Staff Administration Managers
- You are a business partner, demonstrating proactive and strategic thinking, are able to discuss complex business issues / challenges with business leaders and translate business needs into action plans and solutions;
- You manage all disciplinary and compliance issues (work permits, investigations for staff representatives, contracts terminations, etc.) and together with your team ensure concrete measures are set up proactively to decrease issues


What we are looking for
- Higher education degree (Bac +5) in Human Resources; a secondary education from a business school would be beneficial
- You have a minimum 5 years experience in a similar role
- You are used to working on projects, ideally in an international environment and/ or start-ups
- Previous Management experience required
- You are committed to the quality of service provided to your internal customers and skilled at continuously improving processes
- Independent, adaptable, strong-willed, rigorous, dynamic are personality traits that describe you and allow you to be a central played in the company’s strategic planning. 
- You also demonstrate excellent interpersonal skills. Other skills required: Reactivity, Open-minded, Proactivity, Flexibility
- Fluent English
- You're ready for an adventure in a fast-paced environment!

jobs.title: Sales Enablement Specialist (Sales Readiness)
jobs.description:
This is a high-energy, global sales enablement specialist role that aims to unleash sales expertise and success.

Reporting to the VP Sales Strategy & Enablement, you will contribute to AB Tasty hyper-growth by helping grow our sales expertise, content, assets and tools.



What you will do
- Help onboard new sales hires by delivering content, training & workshops that speed up their ramp-up time.
- Be a central point when it comes to streamline & ease teams feedback loop.
- Collaborate with product, marketing and customer success teams to build the right sales assets and analysis their impacts.
- Ensure global guidance and spread collaterals, knowledge, best practices & tips across countries.
- Improve our centralization & spreading of training information, content and e-learning using our existing platforms and/or finding better solutions.
- Stay current on product knowledge, positioning and market trends.
- Monitor results of your actions and adapt to the sales needs.


What we are looking for
- Fluent English, Working French is a plus
- Successful Marketing and/or Sales Enablement Experiences
- Excellent projects management skills 
- Knowledge of Digital & SaaS environment
- Strong Interest in Business, Sales Pitch & Go-to-Market Strategies
- A team player, with excellent interpersonal skills, enthusiastic and positive personality, with a can-do attitude.

jobs.title: Senior Key Account Manager - Paris
jobs.description:
Are you a high-energy, driven professional who is passionate about e-commerce, digital marketing and new technologies?

We are looking for a skilled Key Account Manager (KAM) to oversee our relationship with our French clients. As a KAM, you will be responsible for obtaining and maintaining long term key customers by understanding their requirements of the AB Tasty platform and uncovering their needs for the future in the ever-changing world of CRO. 

The ideal candidate will be capable of building strong relationships with strategic customers. You will be able to identify the demands and requirements to promote our company’s solutions and achieve a mutually beneficial cooperation. As Key Account Manager, you will be responsible for contract renewals, upselling and cross selling of your customer portfolio.


What you will do
- Develop relationships with a portfolio of major clients to ensure their continuous engagement with the AB Tasty platform
- Acquire a thorough understanding of key customer needs and requirements 
- Propose solutions that meet the client’s objectives and changing demands
- Ensure the correct products and services are delivered to customers in a timely manner
- Expand the relationships with existing customers engaging through all possible forms of contact, from meetings to weekly calls
- Serve as the link of communication between key customers and internal teams
- Resolve any issues and problems faced by customers and manage complaints in order to maintain trust
- Play an integral part in generating new sales that will turn into long-lasting relationships 
- Prepare regular reports of progress and forecasts to internal and external stakeholders using key account metrics


What we are looking for
- 7+ years experience in a sales function of B2B platforms 
- Knowledge of digital marketing and SaaS platforms
- Proven experience implementing customer retention initiatives, achieving high retention rates and customer satisfaction
- You must have excellent negotiation techniques and you are used to dealing with decision makers, mostly Heads of Marketing and Product Departments
- Strong team player, tenacious, and results-driven
- Experience working with [Salesforce.com](http://Salesforce.com) is a plus
- Align with AB Tasty core values: Customer satisfaction, reactivity, team spirit, enthusiasm 
- Comfortable with working in a fast-paced and dynamic environment

jobs.title: Senior Partner Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
AB Tasty (www.abtasty.com) helps build the internet of the future by allowing brands to address their users in a personalized way. Images, messages, page structure...everything can be adapted to meet the needs, wishes, and emotions of website visitors or app users.  AB Tasty isn't about helping brands to push a hard sell. We're about helping them sell better, by creating more positive consumer and user experiences across digital properties.
 
We must be on to something, since we're proud to say we have:
·       850+ customers, including Sephora, Land Rover, Cartier, and Ashley HomeStore
·       220+ employees in 6 countries on 3 continents (Americas, Europe, Asia)
·       Raised $24 million to grow globally
·       Bonus: we're nice, too, we promise!
 
2 prerequisites if you want to join the AB Tasty team:
·       Be a genuinely kind person! (we take this one seriously, it's half the battle in the recruitment process)
·       Have a passion, whatever it may be :)

The Role
The Senior Partner Marketing Manager is focused on growing and sustaining long-term relationships with partners and agencies through joint activation, engagement, and enablement programs. Our partner marketing team collaborates across many AB Tasty teams and engages directly with tech partners, agencies and customers, requiring exceptional skills in communicating with stakeholders across multiple functional areas. In this role, you will take responsibility for creating and implementing go-to-market plans with key AB Tasty partners, including the most central and innovative companies in the martech and agency ecosystem.

The Team
We are a growing global team with a mix of experience from tech and non-tech companies, bringing a diverse set of experience to inform our thinking on how we build and execute our marketing plans. We collaborate all the time, but also hold space for our individual work. We’re in a chapter of intense focus, and we’re looking for a new awesome team member to jump in and continue to help us grow and succeed!
Learn more about the USA team here. 


Skill set
- 5+ years’ experience in partner marketing, channel marketing, product marketing, or go-to-market roles.
- Proven experience in building, growing and scaling marketing partnerships.
- Align with AB Tasty core values: **customer satisfaction, agility, team spirit, enthusiasm, kindness**
- Strong experience developing and executing successful marketing plans as well as driving co-marketed demand generation programs.
- Expertise in webinars, events, email campaigns, copywriting & messaging, building joint value propositions.
- Good knowledge of the SaaS industry and the digital martech and agency ecosystem.
- Self-motivated and able to take initiative without needing a high level of supervision.
- Detail oriented and able to set and hit aggressive project deadlines.
- Highly adaptable and a solid team player with proven ability to develop and maintain strong working relationships, we achieve more as a group!
- Exceptional interpersonal, communication, problem-solving, and project management skills.
- Ability to thrive, multi-task and juggle many simultaneous priorities in a fast paced environment.
- Detail-oriented and excellent problem-solver.
- Expertise with Salesforce and marketing automation tools such as Pardot.
- Ability to legally work in the US (sponsorship not available)


What you’ll do
- Design, build and execute marketing programs to support our partnership team including demand generation, positioning and messaging, enablement & thought leadership.
- Establish joint go-to-market plans with partners and agencies and own the end-to-end execution of co-marketing programs.
- Drive and promote co-marketing programs: events/tradeshows, VIP events, webinars, breakfasts, case studies, email campaigns.
- Coordinate project components with cross-functional teams to deliver programs on time and that achieve program objectives.
- Work with relevant teams to develop partner-oriented presentations and other sales materials as needed.
- Support go-to-market strategies for new product launches.
- Ensure AB Tasty brand and positioning remains consistent and on-brand throughout all marketing activities.
- Drive customer marketing activities (case studies, cross sell campaigns) in North America.
- Build strong relationships across the organization, especially channel sales, that allow you to accomplish all of the above, and ultimately move the needle for AB Tasty.
- Present and communicate results of key partner initiatives, marketing campaigns, case studies, sales pipeline and closed business with the AB Tasty leadership team.


What we offer
- A driven, kind, and humble team that will welcome your input and support your growth
- Opportunities to collaborate with AB Tasty teammates globally
- Monthly local team events
- Generous time off and holidays to recharge with loved ones
- Medical, Dental, & Vision insurance
- 401(k) + company matching
- 100% commuter reimbursement 
- Competitive salary + bonus 


Stay in Touch
Does this role not quite match your skills, but you’re still interested in what we're doing? Stay In Touch and be one of the first to hear about future opportunities! 

AB Tasty is an equal opportunity employer and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

· Be a genuinely kind person! (we take this one seriously, it's half the battle in the recruitment process)
· Have a passion, whatever it may be :)

The Role
The Senior Partner Marketing Manager is focused on growing and sustaining long-term relationships with partners and agencies through joint activation, engagement, and enablement programs. Our partner marketing team collaborates across many AB Tasty teams and engages directly with tech partners, agencies and customers, requiring exceptional skills in communicating with stakeholders across multiple functional areas. In this role, you will take responsibility for creating and implementing go-to-market plans with key AB Tasty partners, including the most central and innovative companies in the martech and agency ecosystem.

The Team
We are a growing global team with a mix of experience from tech and non-tech companies, bringing a diverse set of experience to inform our thinking on how we build and execute our marketing plans. We collaborate all the time, but also hold space for our individual work. We’re in a chapter of intense focus, and we’re looking for a new awesome team member to jump in and continue to help us grow and succeed!
Learn more about the USA team here.

Skill set

  • 5+ years’ experience in partner marketing, channel marketing, product marketing, or go-to-market roles.
  • Proven experience in building, growing and scaling marketing partnerships.
  • Align with AB Tasty core values: customer satisfaction, agility, team spirit, enthusiasm, kindness
  • Strong experience developing and executing successful marketing plans as well as driving co-marketed demand generation programs.
  • Expertise in webinars, events, email campaigns, copywriting & messaging, building joint value propositions.
  • Good knowledge of the SaaS industry and the digital martech and agency ecosystem.
  • Self-motivated and able to take initiative without needing a high level of supervision.
  • Detail oriented and able to set and hit aggressive project deadlines.
  • Highly adaptable and a solid team player with proven ability to develop and maintain strong working relationships, we achieve more as a group!
  • Exceptional interpersonal, communication, problem-solving, and project management skills.
  • Ability to thrive, multi-task and juggle many simultaneous priorities in a fast paced environment.
  • Detail-oriented and excellent problem-solver.
  • Expertise with Salesforce and marketing automation tools such as Pardot.
  • Ability to legally work in the US (sponsorship not available)

What you’ll do

  • Design, build and execute marketing programs to support our partnership team including demand generation, positioning and messaging, enablement & thought leadership.
  • Establish joint go-to-market plans with partners and agencies and own the end-to-end execution of co-marketing programs.
  • Drive and promote co-marketing programs: events/tradeshows, VIP events, webinars, breakfasts, case studies, email campaigns.
  • Coordinate project components with cross-functional teams to deliver programs on time and that achieve program objectives.
  • Work with relevant teams to develop partner-oriented presentations and other sales materials as needed.
  • Support go-to-market strategies for new product launches.
  • Ensure AB Tasty brand and positioning remains consistent and on-brand throughout all marketing activities.
  • Drive customer marketing activities (case studies, cross sell campaigns) in North America.
  • Build strong relationships across the organization, especially channel sales, that allow you to accomplish all of the above, and ultimately move the needle for AB Tasty.
  • Present and communicate results of key partner initiatives, marketing campaigns, case studies, sales pipeline and closed business with the AB Tasty leadership team.

What we offer

  • A driven, kind, and humble team that will welcome your input and support your growth
  • Opportunities to collaborate with AB Tasty teammates globally
  • Monthly local team events
  • Generous time off and holidays to recharge with loved ones
  • Medical, Dental, & Vision insurance
  • 401(k) + company matching
  • 100% commuter reimbursement
  • Competitive salary + bonus

Stay in Touch
Does this role not quite match your skills, but you’re still interested in what we're doing? Stay In Touch and be one of the first to hear about future opportunities!

AB Tasty is an equal opportunity employer and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

jobs.title: Senior Product Manager - Personalization
jobs.description:
Our Product/Tech organization is typical Tribes/Squads. We currently have 3 Tribes and 8 Squads, each composed of a Product Manager, a Product Designer, a Tech Lead and 4 to 6 developers. The Squad can apply a specific framework for the delivery process : Scrum, Kanban, Scrumban… and use their own tools for the discovery as well (no rules, only framework).

As a Senior Product Manager for the personalization Squad, you will have complete ownership of the Personalization product at AB Tasty. This means owning the personalization product roadmap to reach the North star metric, by :



- Finding customers’ problems & opportunities : desirability about your product
- Defining user stories, acceptance criteria, and pairing with product design & engineering to deliver solutions : feasibility of the proposed solution
- Knowing if your product will be able to return value to the company by doing meeting with Sales (renew or new business meetings) : viability of your product
  
An attention to detail and eye for quality are critical to your success, along with an ability to clearly articulate how we solve our customer problems. You are obsessed with tracking performance, and have the data to prove what’s working and what isn’t.For this job, you must possess a unique blend of business and tech savvy; a big-picture vision, and the drive to make that vision a reality. You must enjoy spending time in the market to understand customer problems, and find innovative solutions for the broader market. This is an opportunity to learn and see your actions make an immediate impact. This job is for someone who loves a challenge and wants to work in a Scale up at an international level. 

What you will do :
- **Discovery**
- You master your market:  we’re in a 7,000+ competitor space. We’re fighting everyday for customer budget and battle with very diverse competitors. You’ll have to champion competition, provide oversight, and help position and differentiate against them.
- You’re able to discover product opportunities: you’ll pair with a product designer and work closely with customers, sales, services, customer success, and engineering to discover new problems, and prioritize features based on data evidence, testing, north star metrics, and OKRs.
- You build, measure and learn continuously: you’ll foster a culture of data-driven decision making by proactively measuring the impact of what you’ll build, you’ll make mistakes, iterate, and continuously improve (aka Kaizen).
- You always fight complexity: it is complex to keep things simple. Being lean is your way of life, you thrive to make the minimal investment (we did not say MVP) that will bring the highest value to your users.



- **Delivery**
- You deliver continuously: you own and write comprehensive product opportunity assessments and specifications. 
- You develop epics, user stories, workflows, acceptance criteria and initial prototypes with Product design, and partner with engineers along the way to deliver impactful features … and this continuously.
- You ensure smooth release:  you lead and collaborate with Product Marketing, Product docs & learning, Customer Success and Sales enablement on all readiness activities, including product testing, internal user training, rollout and product support.
- You’re not alone: SaaS platforms are more powerful than point solutions. 
- You analyze potential partner relationships for your product area because we live in an ecosystem.


What we are looking for :
- You have proven 5+ years product management experience. You can demonstrate a strong track record of achievements in designing, building, delivering impactful products & services from a business and usage perspective.
- You are Customer-Centric: you are the voice of the customer because you meet with them regularly, and you ensure features do bring value to them. 
- You breathe and leave technology : you are a curious person, and like “playing” with new apps and tools, you are coding, or know what it takes, and you master. 
- You’re able to define  “A-team” plans : you plan in advance and can anticipate potential risks (technical, operational, legal or business).
- You are always one step ahead, able to zoom in to solve operational problems as well as to zoom out to present a clear strategic roadmap. 
- You’re a top notch communicator: you must be a strong speaker and storyteller, comfortable in front of large, senior groups.
- You’re able to craft light & “easy collaboration” specs : your design and copywriting knowledge is a plus as you will be expected to develop specifications, opportunity assessments, 6-pagers and other light specifications.
- You own a Bachelor's/Master's degree in a technical discipline - Computer Science, Technology, Engineering, Maths- or equivalent experience or equivalent professional experience.
- You’re data-driven: every project you launch starts with KPI definition and objectives. You see data as a strategic asset for the  company and you try to maximise it in every project you start.
- You’re a team player: you go to see others when Slack isn’t efficient. You like to interact with other colleagues and take them to a have beer.
- You’re fast & entrepreneurial: experience in strong growth environment where company changes every 6 months, ability to pivot quickly or take decision with only part of the information.
- You’re english-first: you have excellent written and verbal communication skills as there is a heavy amount of writing and presenting/selling ideas in this role (native english is a plus).
- Bonus: if you already worked in e-commerce, started your own company (even if a failure), these are extra bonuses !

jobs.title: Stay In Touch
jobs.description:
Don't see a role that quite matches your skills, but you’re still interested in what we're doing? Stay In Touch and be one of the first to hear about future opportunities! Send us your resume and any additional relevant information and we'll reach out when there's a new role that matches!

Come join the AB Tasty team and help build the internet of the future with us by allowing brands to address their users in a personalized way. AB Tasty isn't about helping brands to push a hard sell. We're about helping them sell better, by creating more positive consumer and user experiences across digital properties.


Things we typically look for, no matter what role:
- Align with the AB Tasty core values: client satisfaction, agility & innovation, team spirit, enthusiasm, and kindness
- Proven ability to work across many departments to solve problems and achieve results. You have #teamspirit and think about the team before yourself.
- Interpersonal and analytical skills to make and support business decisions. You’re all about figuring out how to take #clientsatisfaction to new heights by putting yourself in their shoes. 
- Flexible and resourceful. You thrive in a dynamic growth and #innovative environment where new challenges are the order of the day and your #agility drives you.
- Superb communication skills. You're a great listener who can respond quickly and efficiently with #enthusiasm and #kindness.
